DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study healthy adult male investigate safety pharmacokinetics single multiple oral dos KDT-3594 . The purpose study patient Parkinson 's disease investigate safety pharmacokinetics single multiple oral dos KDT-3594 . The exploratory efficacy KDT-3594 also investigate .
